At the change of tide, Dr. Vivaldi leaves for herinterview with the Grand Akpar. Only one Raka isleft to guard you. You hand him the gold bracelet.Taking it, he smiles broadly. You hurry past him,but another guard is standing outside the agon.You wheel past him and run for it. The surprisedArchpod yells; you soon hear others chasing you.But in a few moments you reach the shelter of thecluster-leaf groves, and as you go deeper into thewoods, you are relieved that you no longer hearthe Archpods behind you. It's strange,though,that they didn't follow you into the woods.
